channel.title: Compiler
channel.description: Ok well my server takes all the .class files from a folder called bin in my source's main file and my compiler just adds the class files to the main folder i was wondering if someone could make it so all compiled files go to the bin folder but keep the .java files in the main folder

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Nope the old compiler put it in bin folder auto but i accidently deleted it lol and i forgot dl link :d

Read full topic

item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

Well why are you even using a folder to put the class files in?you dont realy need to do that, that folder could go to a much better use ex: making a backup of your source just incase you do something wrong
